Name: ODA
About the game: ODA is a retrowave puzzle-platformer game. Itâ€™s smart and unusual. Can it change your perception of space, time and your own life? We hope not. But it can improve spatial thinking, challenge you with an unusual approach to teleportation. There are style, unique mechanics and an untold story. Your name is Adam, you are in a cyberpunk city, and you need to go forward. Your weapon is a secret invention that shoots with teleballs. With this weapon, you can swap places with objects, swap them with each other and perform... special tricks that are easier to see for yourself. Swap objects. Swap yourself with objects. Wrap. It is difficult to explain briefly, but you will understand what it is during the game. For now, just... Wrap. Solve a variety of puzzles. Explore and find new ways of the playthrough. Join us and help us deepen the world of ODA.
